name: Pocket Pet (subrobots)
description:
Turn your Play Date into a Pocket Pet! Re-live the excitement of having a digital pet but on your new stylish Play Date!

** FEATURES **

  • 3 different types of pets! (Depending on diet!)
  • Unlimited leveling (GFX only to level 10 on version 1.0)
  • 10 different end game insults for killing your pet (more to come!)
  • 10 random jokes in joke menu (more to come!)
  • Food depletes over time
  • Aging occurs over time if your pet is fed
  • Save option so you may resume taking care of your pet at another time!

** CONTROLS **

  • UP - Navigate up
  • Down - Navigate down
  • B - Open up selection menu
  • A - Confirm selection

** INSTALLATION **

  • The game must be side loaded into your Play Date.
  • Follow the official side loading guide at if you are unsure how to do so: https://help.play.date/games/sideloading/
  • Otherwise head over to https://play.date/account/sideload/
  • Then choose the Pocket Pet zip file to side load!

** COMING SOON **

  • GFX update
  • More jokes (Classic Yo Momma Jokes)
  • More death insults

** DEV LOG **

  • Version 1.0 <--
  • Report all bugs. I'll fix ASAP.
